primary.request: Check laundry facilities at The Berkley
primary.context: Caller wanted to know if a one-bedroom villa in Las Vegas has in-unit or on-site laundry.
primary.detail: The agent correctly identified a specific property inquiry and transferred the caller to the concierge department.

steps: Agent greeted caller and identified name.
Caller asked about laundry facilities at The Berkley in Las Vegas.
Agent clarified if the request was for in-unit or on-property facilities.
Agent transferred the caller to the concierge department for specific property information.

actions.detail: Transferred to concierge for property-specific amenity info.

insights.summary: The caller inquired about laundry facilities at a specific resort; the AI clarified the request and transferred to concierge.
insights.verbatim: The Berkeley in Las Vegas. If we have a one room does it have laundry facility?
